newsitem.title: USA: U.S. stock index futures end at record high.
newsitem.headline: U.S. stock index futures end at record high.

text.p: July 15 - September S&P 500 stock index futures pushed to a new contract high of 934.00 in the afternoon and finished the session at another all-time high close. Mid-month portfolio rebalancing and strength in the technology sector propeled the contract up, analysts said. Market awaiting Intel second quarter earnings expected this afternoon.
